alert.note: Alert for Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 4:23AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT ROLETTE COUNTY THROUGH 445 AM CDT... At 423 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rolla, or 34 miles east of Bottineau, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rolla, Dunseith, Rolette, St. John, International Peace Garden, Belcourt, Shell Valley, Mylo, Turtle Mountain, Agate, and Thorne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
